name: Starsiege: Raiders
storyline:
Humanity is on the run from Prometheus' cybrid army.
Ancient alien artifacts have been discovered across the solar system.
Only the highest echelon of mercenaries are brave enough to infiltrate enemy territory and reclaim these artifacts.
These are the Raiders.
summary: Starsiege: Raiders is a new PvPvE first person looter shooter with procedurally generated environments.
